siteMetadata.description: Studying Computer Science @ University of York
siteMetadata.about: A second year Computer Science student seeking a summer internship in software development or other related fields. I enjoy learning practically on projects and also enjoy researching topics independently. I am most proficient with Python but also have experience in JavaScript and Java. I also have many years of experience with Linux systems and Git version control.
